path.style: stroke-width: 50; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 215, 0); fill: none;
stroke-width: 47; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(221, 160, 221); fill: none;
stroke-width: 46; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(176, 224, 230); fill: none;
